dt: {bc}to procure (something, such as goods or services needed by a business or organization) from domestic or in-house sources rather than from foreign or outside suppliers {bc}to contract for work, jobs, etc., to be done by in-house or domestic workers

dt.t: More recently, Physicians Mutual {wi}insourced{/wi} the previously outsourced administration of a particular product.
Employment guarantees are not the only reason to {wi}insource{/wi}, and car makers are not the only companies doing it.

shortdef: to procure (something, such as goods or services needed by a business or organization) from domestic or in-house sources rather than from foreign or outside suppliers : to contract for work, jobs, etc., to be done by in-house or domestic workers
